item.title: F.B.I. Agents Fired by Patel Speak Out on ‘Broken’ Trust

item.title: Hepatitis B Vaccine, Once a Public Health Win, Is Under Threat From RFK Jr.
item.description: Rates of the disease have fallen since 1991, when a vaccine committee recommended all newborns receive the shot.

item.title: Robert Redford, Screen Idol Turned Director and Activist, Dies at 89
item.description: He made serious topics like grief and political corruption resonate with the masses, in no small part because of his own star power.

item.title: We Are Going to Have to Live Here With Each Other
item.description: Ben Shapiro and I discuss the state — and stakes — of political disagreement in America.
